name: git
subtitle: Git
about: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.

videos.title: What is Version Control?
videos.description: How does version control work in general? What benefits can I expect?

videos.title: Installing & Configuring Git
videos.description: How do I install and configure Git on my machine?

videos.title: The Basic Workflow of Version Control
videos.description: Which steps are typically involved when using version control?

videos.title: Creating a New Local Repository
videos.description: How do I create a new repository on my machine?

videos.title: Cloning an Existing Repository
videos.description: How can I work with an existing repository from a remote server?

videos.title: Inspecting Local Changes
videos.description: Which files are currently modified - and how?

videos.title: Staging & Committing Changes
videos.description: How can I add changes to the next commit? How can I save changes as a new revision in the repository?

videos.title: Commit History
videos.description: How can I see what has happened in my repository? How can I review my repository's history?

videos.title: Ignoring Files
videos.description: How can I prevent certain files from being versioned / tracked by Git?

videos.title: Introduction to Branches
videos.description: What are branches? What is so special about the branching model (compared to SVN)? Why should you use them?

videos.title: Creating & Checking Out Branches
videos.description: How can I create a branch? How can I make a branch active?

videos.title: What is Version Control?
videos.description: This video explains the basics of a version control.

videos.title: What is Git?
videos.description: In this video you will learn an introduction about Git.

videos.title: Get Going with Git
videos.description: In this episode the main commands will be explained about how to survive using Git.

videos.title: Quick wins with Git
videos.description: This video explains some useful tips for Git.

videos.title: Beginning with Git
videos.description: This is a long screencast for beginners and intermediates learn about Git.
